name: roqueform
description: The form state management library that can handle hundreds of fields without breaking a sweat.

scripts.build: tsc --project ./tsconfig.build.json && npm run build:rollup && npm run build:terser && prettier --loglevel warn --write './lib/*.js'
scripts.build:terser: TEMP=$(mktemp) && rm $TEMP && for FILE in $(find ./lib -name '*.js'); do terser --comments all --name-cache $TEMP --compress --mangle-props reserved=[__esModule],regex=/^__/ --output $FILE -- $FILE; done && rm $TEMP || exit 1
